mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clientDetailInfo(clientIdx, name, nickname,gender, job,age,latitude,longitude,religion,education,height,bodyShape, drink,smoke,selfIntro,lastUpdate) VALUES(#{clientIdx}, #{name},#{nickname},#{gender},#{job}, #{age},#{latitude},#{longitude},#{religion} ,#{education},#{height} ,#{bodyShape},#{drink},#{smoke},#{selfIntro},sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE clientDetailInfo SET nickname = #{nickname}, job = #{job}, religion = #{religion}, education = #{education}, height = #{height}, bodyShape = #{bodyShape}, drink = #{drink}, smoke = #{smoke}, selfIntro = #{selfIntro}, lastUpdate = sysdate WHERE clientIdx = #{clientIdx}
